mapper.select: select "order".username, "order".folder, "order".thumbnail, "order".price, count(1) as qty, sum("order".price) as amount from "order" inner join photo on "order".username = photo.username and "order".folder = photo.folder and "order".thumbnail = photo.thumbnail where "order".username = #{username} and "order".folder = #{folder} and "order".charged = true group by "order".username, "order".folder, "order".thumbnail, "order".price order by qty desc, amount desc
mapper.insert: insert into "order" ("number", email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, filename, price, createdt, charged, expiredt) values (#{number}, #{email}, #{username}, #{folder}, #{thumbnail}, #{original}, #{filename}, #{price}, #{createdt}, #{charged}, #{expiredt})
